TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CodeGroup extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示抽象基底類別，程式碼群組之所有實作 (Implementation) 必須從它衍生。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of code groups must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程式碼群組是建置組塊的程式碼存取安全性原則。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每個原則層級是由根程式碼群組可以有子程式碼群組所組成。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups. 每一個子程式碼群組可以有自己的子程式碼群組;此行為會延伸到任何數目的層級，進而形成樹狀。Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每個程式碼群組有成員資格條件，可判斷指定的組件所屬是否根據該組件的辨識項。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly. 只有這些程式碼群組的成員資格條件符合的指定組件的辨識項將會套用。Only those code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly's evidence will be applied. 如果符合的程式碼群組會有子程式碼群組，那些成員資格條件也符合提供的辨識項的子系會同樣地套用。If a matching code group has child code groups, then those children whose membership conditions also match the supplied evidence will likewise be applied.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition membershipCondition, class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement policy) cil managed
Protected Sub New (membershipCondition As IMembershipCondition, policy As PolicyStatement)

param.name: membershipCondition
param.span: 成員資格條件，其測試辨識項以判斷這個程式碼群組是否套用原則。

span.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.

param.name: policy
param.span: 程式碼群組的原則陳述式，形式為要授與符合成員資格條件的程式碼之使用權限集合和屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子程式碼群組的順序很重要的特定程式碼群組。The order of child code groups is significant for certain code groups. > [!NOTE] > 傳回的值是一份子程式碼清單。The return value is a copy of the child code list. 請勿使用傳回的清單來新增子程式碼群組;請改用方法。Do not use the returned list to add a child code group; instead, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 辨識項符合成員資格條件時，原則陳述式會套用至組件中的程式碼。The policy statement applies to code in assemblies when evidence matches the membership condition. 這個屬性也可以設定的原則陳述式傳遞至建構函式。This property can also be set by passing a policy statement to the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會設定之程式碼群組。The following example sets the for a code group. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，解析程式碼群組的原則和它的子代 (Descendant) 辨識項集。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 原則陳述式，包含由程式碼群組以選擇性屬性授與的使用權限，或為 ，如果程式碼群組無法套用 (成員資格條件不符合指定的辨識項)。

span.span: A policy statement that consists of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要載入的組件辨識項，這個方法會評估藉由檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果沒有相符項目，則這個方法會傳回程式碼群組，包括評估子程式碼群組的原則陳述式。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 針對，也會解析所有的子程式碼群組的成員資格條件的比對指定的辨識項，並與父代等位的程式碼群組的原則陳述式結合所有產生的原則陳述式。For a , all child code groups whose membership condition match the specified evidence are also resolved, and all resulting policy statements are combined with the policy statement of the parent union code group. 每一個子程式碼群組類型會決定如何套用其下的所有子群組，依據方法，這些子群組的工作。Each child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. .NET Framework 安全性系統會使用來判斷哪些權限授與給載入的程式碼，從產生的原則陳述式和程式碼要求組件上的原則層級。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，解析符合的程式碼群組。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: ，是符合程式碼群組的樹狀結構的根 (Root)。

span.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法有相同的評估特性。This method has the same evaluation characteristics as . 傳回程式碼群組會包含子程式碼群組，接著可以有子程式碼群組，以反映一組完整的程式碼群組相符的提供辨識項。The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided.

param.span: 程式碼群組所存在的原則層級。

span.span: The policy level within which the code group exists.

summary.span: 建立安全性物件、它的目前狀態和程式碼所存在的原則層級的 XML 編碼方式。

span.span: Creates an XML encoding of the security object, its current state, and the policy level within which the code exists.

returns.span: 安全物件的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

span.span: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 原則層級內容供解析具名使用權限集合。The policy level context is provided for resolution of named permission sets.

span.span: and cannot be overridden.

para.span: 如果您需要變更您的程式碼群組實作會處理 XML 的方式，覆寫和方法。

span.span: If you need to change the way in which your code group implementation handles XML, override the and methods.
